meanings.definition: To sponsor or support jointly with another person or group.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I cosponsored the charity event together.
meanings.sent2: The two companies cosponsored the new community center.
meanings.sent3: The siblings cosponsored a surprise party for their parents.
meanings.sent4: The team cosponsored the initiative, showing unity and collaboration.
meanings.sent5: She cosponsored the fundraiser, demonstrating her commitment to the cause.

meanings.definition: To participate in sponsoring an event or project with others.
meanings.sent1: We cosponsored the school play with the drama club.
meanings.sent2: Many businesses cosponsored the local festival.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors cosponsored a block party to bring the community together.
meanings.sent4: The organizations cosponsored the conference, pooling their resources.
meanings.sent5: He cosponsored the art exhibition, showcasing his support for the arts.
